plot: Sho and his friend Tetsurou stumble upon an odd alien artifact while walking through the woods. Then, the alien artifact breaks free of its metallic bonds and enters Sho's body, turning him into the Guyver. With this new power, Sho must do battle with the evil Chronos corporation and their genetically enhanced Zoanoids, who seek to get the Guyver back into their labs. No one close to Sho is safe from Chronos. He must fight.
opening_theme: "Bio-Booster Armor Guyver" (強殖装甲ガイバー) by Shinichi Ishihara
ending_theme: "Michishirube -Igyō no Messiah-" (道標 -異形の天使-) by Shinichi Ishihara (eps 01-06)
"Guyver!! Mō Hitori no Ore" (ガイバー!!～もう一人の俺～) by Katsumi Yamaura (eps 07-12)
